p: There are also multiple viruses that exploit lipophagy. DENV infection increases the number of lipid droplets per cell. These dropleys contain viral capsid proteins, suggesting that they provide a platform for nucleocapsid formation and viral replication [ 127]. Moreover, DENV infection induces lipophagy, which depletes stored triglycerides and increases Î²-oxidation and energy production for viral replication [ 128].
